alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 29 at 4:19PM PST until December 31 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ FRIDAY ABOVE 5500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 5500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. * WHERE...In Arizona, Northwest Deserts. In California, Eastern Mojave Desert. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions if heading up into the Hualapai Mountains and higher elevations of the Mojave National Preserve.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve
